item.title: NIX/NIXOS: The ULTIMATE VIBEC0RE Operating System
item.description: NIX IS PURE FUCKING VIBEC0RE ðŸ’œâš¡ðŸ”¥ Listen up chooms. You thought Rust was peak VIBEC0RE? MEET NIX. MEET NIXOS. MEET YOUR NEW RELIGION. Why Nix is VIBEC0RE AF Traditional Package Management: 1$ sudo apt update 2$ sudo apt install something 3# Breaks your system 4# Spend 3 hours fixing dependencies 5# Cry NIX Package Management: 1$ nix-shell -p cowsay 2# Use cowsay 3# Exit shell 4# System unchanged 5# ZERO FUCKS GIVEN TO SYSTEM STATE The VIBEC0RE Philosophy Alignment 1.
